summary: Completed comprehensive testing of FlexCard digital business card platform after TapCard rebrand. All core FlexCard features working correctly including branding update, first_name/last_name fields, multiple emails/phones, avatar/cover uploads, real social platform icons, and proper sizing specifications.
passed_tests: Landing page displays FlexCard branding with correct logo
Registration creates user with first_name/last_name fields support
Dashboard shows FlexCard branding throughout interface
Profile editor has first_name/last_name fields instead of just title
Profile editor allows adding multiple emails with labels
Profile editor allows adding multiple phones with labels
Profile editor allows changing cover color successfully
Profile editor shows social platform icons with real logos from simple-icons CDN
Avatar upload functionality works with base64 image processing
Cover image upload functionality works with base64 image processing
Public profile displays with large avatar (112px, close to 120px target)
Public profile displays with cover (150px height as specified)
Social links show real platform logos (LinkedIn, Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, GitHub, TikTok)
Backend API /api/ returns FlexCard API message
Backend API supports first_name/last_name in profile updates
Backend API supports multiple emails and phones arrays
Backend API /api/upload/avatar processes base64 images correctly
Backend API /api/upload/cover processes base64 images correctly
Contact form on public profile works and submits successfully
FlexCard footer branding appears on public profiles
Save contact (vCard download) functionality works
Share functionality works on public profiles

success_percentage.backend: 100% (14/14 API endpoints working including new FlexCard features)
